attributes.action: remove women from war zones and be more specific about age for the armed services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is, of course, every individuals' own right either to join or not to join,
the armed forces. National conscription is no longer a legal requirement of every citizen, but as a fellow human being, as well as a British subject, I am moved by the sacrifice made so many by NATO forces - are these risks and dangers too much for certain categories of people ?
